snippet: Wendy E. Long, a former Supreme Court clerk and corporate litigator who is seeking to unseat Senator Charles Schumer, said Mr. Trump had shaped much of her current thinking....
abstract: Wendy E Long, Republican nominee for United States senator from New York, has increasingly allied herself with Donald Trump, in contrast to many Republicans, particularly women, who are distancing themselves from his candidacy; shift away from more mainstream principles she used to espouse is bid to be more competitive against incumbent Sen Chuck Schumer.
lead_paragraph: Wendy E. Long, a former Supreme Court clerk and corporate litigator who is seeking to unseat Senator Charles Schumer, said Mr. Trump had shaped much of her current thinking.

headline.main: A Senate Hopeful Veers From Republican Mainstream, and Toward Donald Trump
headline.print_headline: Senate Hopeful Veers From Mainstream, and Toward Trump
